summary:
Adds 45 custom rings with larger gemstones
Opal changed to Garnet
descriptionHtml:
***********************************************[img]http://i.imgur.com/9Cf7iel.jpg?1[/img]***********************************************
[font=\"Comic Sans MS\"][size=\"3\"]I never liked the vanilla gemstone rings, it was almost impossible to see the gems at any distance of more than a few yards. This collection remedies that. The collection is comprised of nine gem types and five metal types that are craftable at any forge under jewelry using vanilla Skyrim resources. It is intended to be a companion with [url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28780\"]UNP Jewelry Variants[/url] but is  standalone and has no other requirements than Skyrim v-1.8.151. 

Gemstones:
Amber
Amethyst
Diamond
Emerald
Garnet
Onyx
Sapphire
Turquoise
Ruby

Metals:
Silver
Gold
Ebony
Jade
Moonstone
***************************************************************************************************
It has been tested with Dawnguard and Skyrim v 1.8 but is not Dawnguard dependent.

[Compatibilities]
With all mods,since it uses the standard ring slot.Visible with or without guantlets.

[Incompatibilities]
If your Skyrim version is lower than V1.8 the items will not be available. 
Sorry, but thatâ€™s due to our friends at Bethsada for a lack of backward CK compatibility.

[Tools Used]
Skyrim CK v1.8
Nifscope

[Permissions]
*****************************************************************************************************
I would like to thank Reaper9111 for his very gracious permission to use his modders resources in this work.  
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25491
 (Je vous remercie beaucoup mon ami)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
*****************************************************************************************************
Last but by no means least my gratitude to Silver DNA who has been my partner in this endeavor 
(Danke mein Freund)
******************************************************************************************************
This is a Nexus only release and I expressly forbid it\'s re uploading to any other site.
 Any use in part or whole of this mod requires my approval.
******************************************************************************************************
[NMM Installation]
The mod is in Nexus Mod Manger format and that is the recommended method[/size][/font]
author: Aurielius
